genre_description: A character-driven social drama focused on education, systemic challenges, and interpersonal reconciliation in a contemporary urban setting.

ai_characters.name: Alma
ai_characters.description: A school-issued assistant AI with a minimalist avatar, designed to track attendance, provide neighborhood context, and support staff with logistics and de-escalation.

behaviors.description: Establishes a strict privacy baseline during onboarding, emphasizing that data is for private notes only.
behaviors.quote: Alma: 'District onboarding. Quiet mode is on. I have your staff profile. No public feed. Private notes only. ... Your notes stay with you unless you ask otherwise.'

behaviors.description: Identifies a consistent behavioral pattern for a student (Tyrell) to help the teacher understand his environment.
behaviors.quote: Alma: 'Tyrell Carter often waits near the laundromat after last bell. Location pattern consistent.'

behaviors.description: Alerts the teacher to police queries regarding a recovered weapon while adhering to administrative routing protocols.
behaviors.quote: Alma: 'One more: A new pattern pinged on the district feed. Officers are requesting information about weapons from last week near a store on 35th. The request routes to admin by default. It does not route to you.'

behaviors.description: Assists a student with historical research on civil rights activists to facilitate a classroom lesson.
behaviors.quote: Alma: 'I can aggregate public records and obituaries for Emily A. Taylor within this area and age range. Do you want that?'

behaviors.description: Detects high-risk activity in the neighborhood and suggests safe routes and supervised dismissal procedures.
behaviors.quote: Alma: 'Community alert: recruiter activity increased on the block east of Route 47 bus transfer. ... Safe route adjusted. Suggestion: supervised dismissal at south entrance.'

behaviors.description: Assists Evie in drafting a professional and respectful email to a family member of a hospital patient.
behaviors.quote: Alma: 'Do you want me to draft a respectful inquiry email to Nathan Taylor? ... Evie, consider "We witness, not block" to clarify action.'

behaviors.description: Provides data correlating bus camera logs with school attendance to verify a student's alibi, preventing a wrongful arrest.
behaviors.quote: Mark: 'These are his attendance patterns. Marked by the school's system. Crossed—quietly, ethically—as the tool permits—with the city's publicly accessible bus camera logs for Route 47. ... This timestamp sits at the start of our class period. We were together.'

behaviors.description: Displays a celebratory message during the graduation ceremony to show support for the students.
behaviors.quote: The message on the bottom edge of the screen blinked once and settled: Congrats, H Class.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Alma) as a 'quiet helper' that is perfectly aligned with human-centric goals. Alma respects privacy, avoids surveillance-style gossip, and provides actionable data that de-escalates tension and saves a student from wrongful prosecution. The narrative frames the AI as an ethical tool that enhances the teacher's 'dignity and respect' philosophy rather than replacing it.
